question.text: Mark the incorrect statement with respect to single-cell protein.

options.text: It is one of the alternate source of protein for animal and human nutrition
It involves growing of unicellular microbes only on industrial scale
They can be easily grown on materials like waste water.
Such utilisation also reduces enviromental pollution.

solution.text: Single cell protein involves growing of unicellular and multicellular microbes on industrial scale which is used as alternate source of protein for animal and human nutrition. They can be easily grown on material like waste water from potato processing, sugar industry etc. and also reduces environmental pollution.
